featureName: Weather Web App with Zipcode Input

epics.title: Project Foundation
epics.goal: Set up the web app project structure with build tooling and basic configuration
epics.definitionOfDone: Project runs locally with dev server, basic page renders

epics.title: Zipcode Input
epics.goal: User can enter and validate a US zipcode to search for weather
epics.definitionOfDone: Zipcode input validates, submits, and triggers weather fetch

epics.title: Weather API Integration
epics.goal: Backend proxies weather data from external API securely
epics.definitionOfDone: Backend endpoint returns weather data for valid zipcode

epics.title: Current Weather Display
epics.goal: Display current weather conditions for the searched location
epics.definitionOfDone: Current weather displays with temperature, conditions, and icon

epics.title: Weather Forecast
epics.goal: Display 5-day weather forecast for the location
epics.definitionOfDone: 5-day forecast displays with daily highs, lows, and conditions

epics.title: UI Polish & UX
epics.goal: Refine the user experience with loading states, animations, and responsive design
epics.definitionOfDone: App is fully responsive, has smooth transitions, and handles all edge cases gracefully
